value.name: Chief Says Shot That Struck Officer Jacai Colson “Deliberately Aimed At Him” By Another Officer
value.description: n a press conference Wednesday morning, the Prince George’s County police chief said the shot that struck Officer Jacai Colson was “deliberately aimed at him” by another officer.

value.name: MD officer shot and killed by fellow officer
value.description: Police officers in Maryland are mourning the loss of Jacai Colson, a 28-year-old officer, who was killed Sunday in the line of duty. Colson was not in uniform when he joined other officers in ...

value.name: The Latest: Maryland chief: Officers devastated by shooting
value.description: 30 p.m. Prince George's county police chief Hank Stawinski says Jacai Colson was a 4-year veteran of the Maryland county's police force and not in uniform at the time he was fatally shot.
